page.title: 11Schools In 1945
page.content: NEWBRIDGE IN 1945 ___________________ researched by Sarah Probert Q.What equipment was there in schools? In our school we had 2 cricket balls,and 1 rugby ball. Q.what was the highlight of 1945 for you? The highlight of 1945 for me was bonfire night,because we hadn't had one all through the war because of air raids.We made them of all bracken ,because we had no fireworks,paper or tyres.another important highlight of 1945 was the soldiers returning from the war especially prisoners of war.A lot of Poles and Hungarians came to this country after the war to work in the mines.I can always remember the obvious language difficulty they had.
